What is Orion3D ?

 Orion3D is a portable 3D engine using OpenGL and advanced rendering techniques such as Portals, PVS, BSP, hierarchical animation, particules systems, etc... visit http://www.orion3d.fr.st for up-to-date information about Orion3D.

What is OrionViewer ?

OrionViewer is a small program that is used to test Orion3D different features. We strongly recommand that you start learning using Orion3D by simply modifying this program.

How to use it ?

Use space to toggle between menu mode and move mode.
  • In menu mode, you can press right mouse button to roll over an options menu.
  • In move mode, you can move using left button + mouse [rotation], and left button + mouse [translation].
See help [press H or by the menu] for a complete listing of all features.
